questions.question: What is the dominant color of the inflatable mattress shown?

What appears to be the primary material used for construction?
Considering the visible texture, how would you describe its surface?
Are there any noticeable raised lines or features on the top surface?
Based on the image, what is the apparent thickness of the mattress?
Judging by the appearance, does it seem designed for single or double use?

Can you identify any branding or logos printed on the mattress?
What is the apparent inflation status of the product in the image?
Describing the edges, are they straight or curved?
